C

checkBounds(int, int) - Method in class com.srikanthtumati.GameOfLifeSingleton
This method checks whether the specified location is out of bounds
checkNeighbors(int, int) - Method in class com.srikanthtumati.GameOfLifeSingleton
This method confirms that each cell in the board checks 8 neighboring cells and wraps around the board when necessary.
com.srikanthtumati - package com.srikanthtumati
 

D

duplicateBoards() - Method in class com.srikanthtumati.GameOfLifeSingleton
This method performs a deep copy from the main board to the temporary board (updateGeneration)

M

The main method that creates a GameOfLife object and runs the appropriate commands to run exactly the desired amount of ticks (specified by the user)

P

This method analyzes an individual row of data from the input file.

R

readFile(String, GameOfLifeSingleton) - Static method in class com.srikanthtumati.GameOfLifeParseData
This method is the main method which reads the file and transfers the appropriate row data the GameOfLife object

S

setDimensions(Integer[]) - Method in class com.srikanthtumati.GameOfLifeSingleton
This method Sets the dimensions (rows and columns) of the main board and the temporary board (updateGeneration)
setRow(Integer[], int) - Method in class com.srikanthtumati.GameOfLifeSingleton
This method takes in a row of data and then proceeds to update the board with the appropriate values

T

toString() - Method in class com.srikanthtumati.GameOfLifeSingleton
This method returns the string version of the board.

U

updateCell(int, int, int) - Method in class com.srikanthtumati.GameOfLifeSingleton
This method performs the appropriate action by checking the current status of the cell and the number of live neighbors surrounding it.
updateTick() - Method in class com.srikanthtumati.GameOfLifeSingleton
This method performs a single tick update on the current board.
userInput() - Static method in class com.srikanthtumati.GameOfLifeMain
This method collects user input and places into an array for easier transfer.

W

This method is the main method which is used to place the output from the GameOfLife into new text files.
